snippet: Sue Coe’s art, which has a political agenda, has taken on apartheid and the meat industry, among other issues.
abstract: Holland Cotter reviews paintings by Sue Coe at Galerie St Etienne.
lead_paragraph: Sue Coe’s art, which has a political agenda, has taken on apartheid and the meat industry, among other issues.

headline.seo: SUE COE: ‘Mad as Hell!: New Work (and Some Classics)’
headline.main: Sue Coe: ‘Mad as Hell!: New Work (and Some Classics)’
headline.print_headline: Sue Coe: ‘Mad as Hell!: New Work (and Some Classics)’
